Reviews.Title: “Average Stay - quality / price average +”
Reviews.Author: Elisabeth B
Reviews.Content: nice bath noisy outside excellent staff efficient reception desk cleaning buffet breakfast excellent variety choice foods breakfast location airport ans 4 stations main turistic ramblas sagrada familia park guell marina casa batlo gotic block etc didnt tried swimming pool beacuse weather plus location nice staff breakfast buffet minus noisy

Reviews.Title: “Excellent reception staff”
Reviews.Author: Canard52
Reviews.Content: wife arrived sunday 15th april booked flighthotel package apparent record booking luckily available sorted hours appeared booking agent front noisy main street outside plus window close properly wife bed morning nice moved twin beds reception staff ready answer questions breakfast 11 euros walked round corner plenty bars offering deals breakfastwe paid 7 euros hotel handy metro stop 3 stops sagrada 10 metres called mario takeaways hotel objections bringing pizza drinking bottle wine roomthey bottle

Reviews.Title: “Noisy, but clean”
Reviews.Author: Trips1211
Reviews.Content: hotel clean towels changed daily 3 days stayed toiletries hotel located busy street noisy traffic light sleep recommend eat nice dishes location metro 3 stops city center change metro line journey quick 10 15 min total underground excellent

Reviews.Title: “Great 2 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: BraveheartA
Reviews.Content: spent pleasant 4 days hotel city hustle bustle breakfast buffet selection class total ambiance easy access girona airport 54 bus leaves round corner terminates estacio nord airport bus leaves definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for a basic, CLEAN, cheap place to stay near subway...this is it.”
Reviews.Author: kimmyny21
Reviews.Content: clean staff friendly friend late night door locked desk guy running bathroom safety feel ok water hot beds comfortable travelling dont spend time perfect little beaten path steps subway perfect little noisy sleep looking clean affordable

HotelInfo.Name: Sunotel Junior
